sql.command: select a.account_id, a.account_head, a.account_code from ( Select -99 as account_id, 'All' as account_head, '' as account_code union All (select account_id, account_head, account_code from ac.account_head a where account_type_id = 46 And not exists (Select account_id from ac.account_head_hidden b where (branch_id=:pbranch_id or :pbranch_id=0) and a.account_id=b.account_id) order by account_head asc) ) a
